title: NO DEPOSIT-Near Carthay Circle- OLYMPIC BLVD AND CRESCENT HEIGHTS
posting_body: ['NO SECURITY DEPOSIT', '700 OR HIGHER CREDIT SCORE IS REQUIRED.', 'Near Carthay Circle- OLYMPIC BLVD AND CRESCENT HEIGHTS', 'A Charming French Normandy style with a', 'Remarkable COURTYARD', 'This is an Upper, front 2 Bedroom / 1 Bath Apartment.', 'The unit features a Formal Dining room + A Private Sundeck.', 'Live in a French Normandy style Building.', 'It is without a Doubt the Best Art piece in the neighborhood.', 'About the unit: A Large Living room with Wood Beamed ceilings.', 'Wood floors are throughout, fire deco, High ceilings with crown moldings, Antique light fixtures all around, and Lots of storage.', 'The bath is separate from shower stall and is covered in its original classic tiles.', 'Lots of (French)windows all around giving the unit tons of lighting.', 'The Hallways are amp!', 'It is spacious enough for a small dent.', 'Built-in vanity/dresser, Formal dining room with a gorgeous Chandelier.', 'This Apartment has a Spacious private Sundeck that faces east.', 'The Kitchen is covered in mint green tiles, stove + fridge is included in the unit.', "It’s a home type setting it doesn't feel like an apartment.", 'There is a shared backyard with Lemon and Grapefruit trees.', 'We have Parking space for an xtra fee.', 'Near by:', 'Beverly Center, Miracle mile, Trader Joes, Shopping center, restaurants, coffee shops and more.....', 'We will consider a pet under 20 lbs for a monthly fee', 'Laundry on site and it is operated with a Smart Application on your smartphone.', 'UTILITIES ARE NOT INCLUDED', '<URL>']
